title: Social Media-Based Science Practitioner Training Course for Strengthening Online Self-Regulated Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level major-specific knowledge in science and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Immersive learning experiences combining hands-on science job simulations with VR technology

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-directed learning strategies for scientific problem-solving on social media platforms (e.g., YouTube) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can record and evaluate their learning process 3+ times using self-regulated learning tools (e.g., learning journals, goal-setting templates) in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can improve collaborative problem-solving skills for science tasks by over 70% through peer feedback and social media-based interactions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
